label: [NodeDev] Node development in Node-RED
info:
::: aim

Provide an explanation of the requirements for developing nodes in Node-RED.

:::

::: background

This is flow is a meta-flow that retrieves various other flows required to do node development in node red. Each of these flows is retrieved by using the `FlowHubPull` node.

Each flow will be similarly imported, using the import flow button inside the FlowHubPull property panel:

![img](https://cdn.openmindmap.org/content/1695803946869_Screen_Shot_2023-09-27_at_10.33.33.png)

After a moment or two, the Node-RED flow import window will open with the flow data of the requested flow:

![img](https://cdn.openmindmap.org/content/1695803958856_Screen_Shot_2023-09-27_at_10.33.51.png)

The dialog should the tell you that the flow was imported:

![img](https://cdn.openmindmap.org/content/1695804321413_Screen_Shot_2023-09-27_at_10.44.55.png)

Import the flow data but if there is a conflict of IDs then can cancel:

![img](https://cdn.openmindmap.org/content/1695803952409_Screen_Shot_2023-09-27_at_10.34.05.png)

flowname: [NodeDev] Node-RED nodes for the development of Node-RED nodes in Node-RED
